articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: NASA delays dress rehearsal of new megarocket - The Verge
articles.description: NASA has delayed the wet dress rehearsal for its Space Launch System megarocket, as technicians were unable to load the rocket with propellant due to pressurization issues.
articles.content:
Technicians were unable to safely load propellants into the rocket due to pressurization problems
Image: NASA/Joel Kowsky via Flickr
